text.more:
An artist has a related artist if a given artists' Spotify Related Artists page lists the other artist. An edge is drawn if this is the case.
 Node size is correlated by Betweenness Centrality; that is, large nodes have a high Betweenness score. 

Initial Data Information:
['100 gecs','yung bae','alan walker','varien','all time low','mod sun','igorrr','drumcorps', 'knocked loose','code orange','alcest','liturgy','inferi','artificial brain']
# two of each pop, synthwave, poppunk, breakcore, beatdown, black, death | total: 14

#seed_artist_list = ['billie eilish','the weeknd','taylor swift','megan thee stallion','drake','ariana grande','bts','beyonce','lady gaga','ed sheeran','bruno mars']
# mainstream artist list | total: 11

 ['zillakami', 'mugxtsu','lil darkie', 'lotus eater', 'gravedgr','scarlxrd', 'blupill']
# "trap metal" , a microgenre as described from The Punk Rock MBA | total: 7

 ['bell witch', 'bereft','conjurer','the flight of sleipnir','fvneral fvkk','giant squid','horse latitudes','om','un',]
# doom metal I like, emphasis on bands that take the genre in various experimental directions | total: 9

'aetheria conscientia', 'calligram','cobalt','cormorant','entropia','imperial triumphant','slaegt','thy catafalque']
# black metal, same criterion as doom | total: 8

['big chef', 'brainleak','capital punishment','consumed by vultures','decomposition of entrails','decimated humans','disfiguring the goddess','goratory','no one gets out alive','slamcoke']
# oddball slamming death metal, emphasis on bands actually trying to sound different | total: 10

 ['lorde','halsey','marina','florence + the machine','owl city','maggie rogers','mystery skulls','sara bareilles']
# popular artist in vein of "Lorde"; breathy, art pop? | total: 8

 ['mumford and sons', 'sonic youth','the shins','yeah yeah yeahs', 'white stripes']
# inde rock artists | total: 5

['shinedown', 'three days grace','papa roach', 'skillet', 'breaking benjamin','hoobastank','seether']
# Butt Rock; evolution of grunge, butt rock is effectively post-post-grunge | total: 7

['black flag','green day','a day to remember','blink-182','the melvins','the offspring','sex pistols','joy division']
# Punk; some greats, some representing various subgenres | total: 8

genres:         total: 85 artists
    Pop:        total: 18
        hyperpop, art pop, pop-country, r & b
    Electric:   total: 4
        future-funk, synthwave, breakcore
    Metal:      total: 31
        black | post-black, black/crust, avant-garde, death | slam, tech-death, doom | funeral, prog, stoner, drone
    Rock:       total: 12
        alt, inde, grunge, butt
    Rap:        total: 10
        trap metal, party rap
    Punk:       total: 10
        beatdown, hardcore, oldschool, pop-punk, easycore, post-punk

These 85 seed artists spawned a network spanning just under 25,000 artists.
text.intro: Network of artists and their related artists as found on Spotify
text.title: Spotify Related Artist Network
